table_definition:
SELECT bmc_incident, bmc_company, bmc_direct_contact_organization, bmc_direct_contact_departement, UPPER(bmc_direct_contact_person_id) AS bmc_direct_contact_person_id, bmc_nome, bmc_cognome, bmc_servizio, bmc_status, TO_TIMESTAMP(bmc_data_submission, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS', 1) AS bmc_data_submission, TO_TIMESTAMP(bmc_data_risoluzione, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS', 1) AS bmc_data_risoluzione, bmc_sommario, bmc_note, bmc_risoluzione
FROM fbk_test1__Dorsale."fbktest1-3mrifs".dorsale.BMC
